price: Hakika wanao mwogopa Mola wao Mlezi kwa ghaibu, watapata maghfira na ujira mkubwa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ
footnotes: Hakika wenye kumkhofu Mola wao Mlezi, na hali wao hawamwoni, watafutiwa madhambi yao, na watapata thawabu kubwa kwa mema yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
